story_text: Dear Bear had a big, fluffy, white ear that could hear everything in the forest.
One clear day, near the river, Bear heard his friend Deer calling to him from over here.
story_images: A big, fluffy, white bear with large ears standing in a forest, surrounded by trees and listening intently.
A gentle river flowing with a deer on one side and Bear on the other, with Deer calling out to Bear.
